Topic.Effect: rob_the_robber.finished = true speak("player", _("Hier ist das ..."),1000) speak("Sergeant Wober",_("Bei allen Teufeln. ..."),1000) local players = getPlayers() local i,player,count count = 0 for i,player in ipairs(players) do count = count + 1 end for i,player in ipairs(players) do if (getPlayerPrivateVar(player,"rob_the_robber.reward") ~= true) then setPlayerPrivateVar(player,"rob_the_robber.reward",true) setObjectValue(player,"gold", getObjectValue(player,"gold") + (3000/count)) end end

Event.Effect: if (rob_the_robber.killed ~= true) then rob_the_robber_tmp.rob = createObject("goblin", "locRob") end
